amendment.description: To provide additional funds for clinical services of the Indian Health Service, with an offset.

action.text: Amendment SA 1734 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1734 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 356.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1734.
Amendment SA 1734 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S11629-11630; text: CR S11629) To provide additional funds for clinical services of the Indian Health Service, with an offset.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1734 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 45. Record Vote Number: 356.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1734 proposed by Senator Daschle.
